Question
========
  
In a sample of 16, the test statistic of the sample mean M has the value 1.67. Under what circumstance should the H0 be rejected? 
Answerlist
----------
* In the case of a 2-sided test with $\alpha$ = 5% and a population with unknown $sigma$.
* In the case of a 1-sided test with $\alpha$ = 5% and a population with unknown $sigma$.
* In the case of a 1-sided test with $\alpha$ = 5% and a population with known $\sigma$.  
* In none of the situations under a, b and c.
